# Automaticly generated by cppspm@0.0.1

add_definitions(-DWSJCPP_VERSION="0.0.1")
add_definitions(-DWSJCPP_NAME="wsjcpp")

# set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)

set (WSJCPP_LIBRARIES "")
set (WSJCPP_INCLUDE_DIRS "")
set (WSJCPP_SOURCES "")

# fallen
list (APPEND WSJCPP_INCLUDE_DIRS "src.wsjcpp/fallen/")
list (APPEND WSJCPP_SOURCES "src.wsjcpp/fallen/fallen.cpp")
list (APPEND WSJCPP_SOURCES "src.wsjcpp/fallen/fallen.h")

# fallen_parse_args
list (APPEND WSJCPP_INCLUDE_DIRS "src.wsjcpp/fallen_parse_args/")
list (APPEND WSJCPP_SOURCES "src.wsjcpp/fallen_parse_args/fallen_parse_args.cpp")
list (APPEND WSJCPP_SOURCES "src.wsjcpp/fallen_parse_args/fallen_parse_args.h")

# nlohmann_json
list (APPEND WSJCPP_INCLUDE_DIRS "src.wsjcpp/nlohmann_json/")
list (APPEND WSJCPP_SOURCES "src.wsjcpp/fallen_parse_args/fallen_parse_args.h")
